#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int i,N,T,A,B,arr[10001],arr2[101],count;
    cin>>N>>T;
    for(i=1;i<=N;i++)
        cin>>arr[i];
    while(T--)
    {
        count=0;
        for(i=1;i<=100;i++)
            arr2[i]=0;
        cin>>A>>B;
        for(i=A;i<=B;i++)
            arr2[arr[i]]++;
        for(i=1;i<=100;i++)
        {
            if(arr2[i]!=0)
                count++;
        }
        cout<<count<<"\n";
    }


    return 0;
}
